name: Pong (itch) (Gus)
description:
This is my first project Ever: A simple Pong Game Recreation made in Godot Engine.

Features:
- PvE
- Training Mode
- Local PvP using (A-D) and Left-Right Arrow Keys.

All the assets were made by me except The Ping Pong Sound Effect and Background Music, here follows the link to the respective owners
- Music By  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Broke_For_Free/Directionless_EP/Broke_For_Fre...
- Sound Effect by https://free-loops.com/7033-ping-pong-.html#google_vignette..

Thanks for Reading, have fun!
